We‚Äôre more than a supplier: we‚Äôre a partner that provides a competitive advantage, a partner that can deliver consistent quality and superior service, a partner that fuels innovation to foster real, sustainable growth.

We have a long history of entrepreneurship, leadership and innovation. That history includes game-changing developments in papermaking, packaging design and retail solutions, as well as strategically building and strengthening our company's capabilities over time.

updates.text:
Enterprises aren't the only organizations impacted by the proliferation of use cases at the edge. Governments and educators are looking to VeloCloud SD-WAN to support traffic flow and segmentation requirements with limited IT lift.

Explore how these organizations use VeloCloud to reduce networking costs, optimize application performance and deploy sites easily.https://brcm.tech/3BxrqcB

#GenAItraffic is encrypted, making it almost impossible to know what applications are doing. To make GenAI work at the edge, you'll need a WAN that understands what your applications are doing.

VeloCloud does the impossible to bring intelligence to application visibility, so you can optimize and prioritize. Ready to bring order to your network?https://brcm.tech/4gaCgnN

üèôÔ∏èShoppers rely on Wi-Fi, especially when cellular connectivity is weak.

If you hadn't noticed, s'mores are having a moment... and a glow up! üî• The holidays are in full swing and more and more festivities are including a fresh take on the winter classic, with#grownupsmoresgarnering more than 50k social mentions in the past month. In our latest research, AUC found that Millennial and Gen Z consumers skew more adventurous with their eating habits, with 63% expressing interest in innovative and unique flavor combos. To make sure your brand is on the menu this holiday season, let's talk.

üî• Self care is hot among Millennial and Gen Z consumers, with a more than 30% increase in TikTok searches for the term over the last year. As part of a daily self care routine to combat burnout, our custom research indicates that Millennial and Gen Z consumers are building "dopamine menus" to prioritize intentional breaks and brief moments of joy. This presents an opportunity for brands to join in on the intentionality early -- reach out to talk how.#selfcare#Millennial#GenZ#dopamine

name: SCORE Mentors Silicon Valley
about:
SCORE, the nation‚Äôs largest network of free, expert business mentors, is a nonprofit association dedicated to entrepreneur education and the formation, growth and success of small business nationwide. 

Because our work is supported by the U.S. Small Business Administration (SBA), and thanks to our network of volunteers, we are able to deliver our services at no charge or at very low cost. 

We provide:
-Volunteer mentors who share their expertise across 62 industries
-Free, confidential business counseling in person or via email
-Free business tools, templates and tips online
-Inexpensive or free business workshops (locally) and webinars (online 24/7)
locations: C/O San Jose Chamber of Commerce, P.O. Box 149, 95103 San Jose, California, US

updates.text: 2024 is winding down.

‚ÄúWe involve our clients in every step of the process, ensuring financial decisions are inclusive and collaborative,‚Äù says Pamela Chen, founder of Refresh Investments. ‚ÄúThis approach helps make financial planning more accessible and empowering, especially for women and families.‚Äù

When Pamela faced challenges expanding her financial planning firm, she turned to SCORE for guidance. Her mentor helped her refine her business strategy, streamline operations and develop a growth plan.

With SCORE‚Äôs support, Pamela launched a new website, hosted webinars, created an Advisory Board and enhanced her client experience. Today, Refresh Investments stands out for its personalized, client-centered approach, offering fee-only fiduciary services tailored to each client‚Äôs unique goals.

Are you ready to take your business to the next level? SCORE offers a wealth of valuable resources to help you succeed and our experienced mentors are here to guide you every step of the way. ‚û°https://lnkd.in/gSfnWRnKüì∏: SCORE client Pamela Chen, founder of Refresh Investments

When Yves Rugasaguhunga founded PrimECS LLC, he envisioned a business that would not only deliver large-scale infrastructure projects like roads, bridges and airports but also create opportunities for professional growth in the U.S. and Rwanda. As the business grew, Yves turned to SCORE for guidance to navigate challenges and plan for expansion.

Yves credits his SCORE mentor with providing invaluable support in strategic planning, financial management and client acquisition. ‚ÄúMy mentor's honest feedback and expert advice have been instrumental in our rapid growth,‚Äù Yves shares. Today, PrimECS employs nearly 68 staff members and supports workforce development through a dedicated training program designed to enhance industry skills and capabilities.

Are you ready to take your business to the next level? SCORE offers a wealth of valuable resources to help you succeed, and our experienced mentors are here to guide you every step of the way. ‚û°https://lnkd.in/gSfnWRnKüì∏: SCORE client Yves Rugasaguhunga, founder of PrimECS LLC

'Tis the season!

Melissa Harlan was on a trip to London, enjoying one of many afternoon teas, when inspiration struck. On the flight home, she began dreaming of leaving her corporate job and started crafting a business plan for a tea room in her hometown.

While attending a small business workshop at her local library, she discovered the services and resources offered by SCORE.

"I believe I was able to launch a new business and survive the pandemic with guidance from programs offered by SCORE. The training and mentoring I received helped me with hiring employees and improving everyday operations," says Melissa.

Are you ready to take your business to the next level? SCORE offers a wealth of valuable resources to help you succeed, and our experienced mentors are here to guide you every step of the way. ‚û°https://lnkd.in/gSfnWRnKüé•: SCORE client Melissa Harlan, owner of Drink Me! Tea Room

Crafting a community one beer at a time! In 2016, Figurehead Brewing was launched by three home brewers with a mission to build connections and enrich lives through quality beer.

Since the early stages of planning, Figurehead Brewing has relied on SCORE‚Äôs mentorship. "The great thing about SCORE as a nonprofit is that they act as a non-advocate review for us," explained co-founder Bob Monroe. "We purchase services from accountants, lawyers and bookkeepers, but it‚Äôs really great to have somebody you can reference and ask questions to, knowing they‚Äôre giving unbiased opinions and facts that will help your business."

With the support of their SCORE mentor, Figurehead Brewing established solid financial systems, transitioned to S-Corp status and took advantage of programs like the PPP loan and Employee Retention Credit. As a result, they opened a second taproom this past spring.

Are you ready to take your business to the next level? SCORE offers a wealth of valuable resources to help you succeed and our experienced mentors are here to guide you every step of the way. ‚û°https://lnkd.in/gSfnWRnKüé•: SCORE clients Figurehead Brewing

Building a business takes dedication, resilience, and the right support. For Monica Perras, owner of MVP Transformation Fitness LLC‚Äîa virtual community helping men and women 40+ achieve their fitness goals‚Äîthat support came from SCORE mentorship.

‚Äú[My SCORE mentor] not only goes beyond the call of duty but has a way of making an impossible business situation seem possible,‚Äù says Monica. ‚ÄúDuring the quarantine of 2020 as my facility was closed, my mentor helped by reassuring me and offering clear steps that would help during that time.‚Äù With expert guidance and SCORE resources, Monica overcame obstacles and grew her business.

name: RATP Dev USA
sphere: Transports urbains et suburbains de voyageurs
about: RATP Dev is a subsidiary of RATP Group established in 2002 to export the Group's operating and maintenance know how outside the historic transit network operated by RATP in the Paris region of France. RATP Dev now operates in 13 countries on four continents. In 2015, RATP Dev generated revenue exceeding 1.1B euros. In North America, RATP Dev USA employs over 6,000 team members transporting more than 80 million passengers throughout the U.S., and operates a wide range of services to include; fixed route, paratransit, rail, tour bus, and sightseeing shuttles.
locations: 300 Throckmorton St., Suite 670, 76102 Fort Worth, Texas, US

updates.text:
Last week, we shared an article from the Boston Globe that discusses the Massachusetts Bay Transportation Authority‚Äôs (MBTA) exciting plans for regional rail and the electrification of its commuter rail system. These developments aim to enhance speed, reliability, and contribute to the region‚Äôs decarbonization efforts in the coming years.

The RER A and B networks in Paris, operated byRATPgroup, recently proved their efficiency once again during the 2024 Olympic Games where tens of thousands of people were successfully transported quickly and safely. As a subsidiary of RATP Group, we take immense pride in our role in ensuring the event's success.

For those unfamiliar with the RER lines, we invite you to explore more about the system and the significant strides made at RATP Dev over the past two decades to modernize Europe's busiest rail network. (About RER:https://lnkd.in/gjVQhcQP)  RATP Group successfully completed system-wide electrification, introduced state-of-the-art amenities, and improved service frequency, reliability, and safety‚Äîall while maintaining daily operations. The skilled engineers and operations staff ensured the seamless maintenance of service while achieving ambitious goals with considerable capital investment.

We wish the MBTA and the state of Massachusetts the best of luck as they embark on their own ambitious rail transformation. We look forward to watching their progress.

Read the full article here:https://lnkd.in/gNSyJCxMLearn more about RATP Dev:https://lnkd.in/eh6hCSMw#MBTA#RER#CommuterRail#TransitInnovation#PublicTransit#RATPDev#RATPDevUSA

üöÄ Operation Career: Military Makeover at RATP Dev USA üöÄ

To all our service members transitioning to civilian life: ‚ÄúYour mission isn‚Äôt over ‚Äì it evolves with us.‚Äù  At RATP Dev USA, we recognize and value the skills, experiences, and dedication you‚Äôve gained during your military service. Our company offers diverse career opportunities where you can excel, grow, and make a real impact in the communities we serve.

From training and mentorship to a supportive environment, we‚Äôre here to help you succeed. Join our team and continue to serve the greater good by providing essential transit services that enhance the lives of individuals and communities.

üëâ Apply today and see how your service can make a difference in the communities we serve.https://lnkd.in/gfms-v9a#MilitaryToCivilian#VeteransInTransit#WeValueYourService#RATPDevUSA

Destination Spotlight: Zion National Park

üå≤ Discover the breathtaking beauty of Zion National Park! From towering sandstone cliffs to winding rivers and lush canyons, every corner of Zion offers a stunning adventure. Whether hiking to iconic spots like Angels Landing or simply soaking in the serene views, Zion's natural wonders promise an unforgettable escape into nature. Don't miss out on exploring this Utah gem! üèûÔ∏è#ZionNationalPark#UtahAdventures#DestinationSpotlight#RATPDevUSA
Check out this episode ofPaul Comfort‚ÄòsTransit Unpluggedwith our CEO,Matt Booterbaugh!

üöó‚ú® Holiday Season Safety Reminder from RATP Dev USA ‚ú®üö∂‚ôÄÔ∏è

The holidays are here! As we celebrate the season, let‚Äôs all work together to keep our roads safe. Whether you‚Äôre behind the wheel or walking to your destination, remember to:
Watch for pedestrians ‚Äì Busy streets mean more people out and about. Always be alert when crossing or driving near crosswalks.

Stay focused ‚Äì Avoid distractions, keep your eyes on the road, and drive with care.
Drive responsibly ‚Äì Be mindful of road conditions, traffic, and other drivers, especially in winter weather.

Let‚Äôs make this holiday season safe and enjoyable for everyone.#DriveSafe#HolidaySafety#StayAlert#RATPDevUSA

RATP Dev USA is both honored and excited to be mentioned in the recent Boston Globe article, which discusses the Massachusetts Bay Transportation Authority‚Äôs (MBTA) exciting plans for the future of its commuter rail system.RATPgroup(Read the full article here:https://ow.ly/fHIZ50UmMAX)RATPgroup, the operator responsible for the RER A and RER B, has achieved remarkable advancements in service for commuters in Paris and its surrounding areas. These improvements were driven by the electrification of the system, the introduction of more frequent trains and full-day schedules, and a strengthened focus on enhancing the overall customer experience. We are pleased to see the comparison drawn between the MBTA and the RER, as well as between Boston and Paris. We encourage you to read the full article for more details. 

Here‚Äôs what one expert in the article had to say: 

‚ÄúTransit experts interviewed for this story point to the R√©seau Express R√©gional rail network in Paris as a leading example for Massachusetts. The high-frequency rail system, better known as the RER, first opened in the 1970s and connects the French capital with towns and cities in the region‚Äôs periphery, making for significantly reduced travel times. 

But don‚Äôt brush off your best ‚ÄúEmily in Paris‚Äù beret to board the MBTA‚Äôs commuter rail: The RER runs trains sometimes at 2-minute intervals, according to the International Association of Public Transport. Local regional rail advocates want to see a regional rail network here with trains arriving every 10 minutes in the urban core, every 15 minutes within Route 128, and every half- hour in the suburbs. 

‚ÄúWhat is true [is] that the creation of the RER system in the Paris region, which is similar in some ways to what is being proposed in Boston, was associated with very significant growth in the suburban areas along the rail line,‚Äù said *Yonah Freemark, a principal research associate at the Urban Institute‚Äôs Metropolitan Housing and Communities Policy Center.‚Äù#MBTA#RER#CommuterRail#TransitInnovation#PublicTransit#RATPDev#RATPDevUSA

These improvements were driven by the electrification of the system, the introduction of more frequent trains and full-day schedules, and a strengthened focus on enhancing the overall customer experience. üöó Drive Your Career Forward with RATP Dev USA üöó

Leadership is more than a position ‚Äì it's a responsibility. Your military experience has already shaped you into a leader, and we want to give you the tools and opportunities to excel. Whether you‚Äôre leading a team in operations or managing complex transportation projects, there‚Äôs a place for your leadership to shine here.

name: Ocean State Job Lot
about:
Ocean State Job Lot is the Northeast's largest, privately held, closeout retail chain with 153 stores in New England, New York, New Jersey and Pennsylvania; approximately 5,600 associates; and annual sales exceeding $800 million.  Since our founding in 1977, we've been helping shoppers buy a lot more of the useful things they need for a lot less of their hard-earned money. We sell an ever-changing array of household goods, apparel, pet supplies, kitchen pantry staples, and seasonal products (such as holiday, gardening, and pool supply) at a fraction of their typical price. 

Ocean State Job Lot is committed to being a progressive company where we put people first. We value our diverse team of associates and continually seek opportunities to strengthen the communities we serve. We promote a positive work-life balance, offering many resources to help our associates with all aspects of their well-being. We also offer a flexible workplace that offers many hybrid roles throughout our corporate departments.

The Ocean State Job Lot Charitable Foundation has a long history of philanthropic leadership, placing emphasis on assisting people in need, including children, veterans and military, those who are homeless, and those struggling with food insecurity; aiding animal rescues, shelters and welfare organizations; and providing support for healthcare programs and services.
locations: 375 Commerce Park Road, 02852 North Kingstown, Rhode Island, US

Ocean State Job Lot is¬†raising the bar on¬†Quality.¬†We are committed¬†to delivering¬†the best possible products and services to our valued customers. That's why we're excited to announce the#hiringof a strategic, visionary leader to drive our¬†Quality Assurance¬†initiatives within our 1.2 million square ft., state of the art, fully automated, expansive Distribution Center, located in North Kingstown, RI. By investing in¬†Quality Assurance, and with a focus on quality control, root cause analysis, and continuous improvement, we're investing in you, our customer. Expect even better products, faster delivery, and a more seamless shopping experience. Join us in our mission to deliver excellence.

Job Lot associates who are URI alumni were featured in a story detailing our company's unique relationship with the university. The article came out last week in the latest copy of the URI magazine. Check it out!

Ocean State Job Lot CEO and Principal Owner Marc Perlman was named a 2024 Inspiring CEO by Inspiring Workplaces! The Inspiring CEO Award recognizes those who have positively impacted their organization and its people. This award honors Marc for personally reengaging Store and District Team Leaders to drive operational excellence. Congratulations, Marc!

Ocean State Job Lot is hiring! Our ownCasey Grimesspoke toWPRI-TVabout some open roles in our stores, distribution center, and corporate office and what we look for in job seekers using our company's Mission, Vision and Values. If you're interested in learning more, visithttps://lnkd.in/ejaBqBqv.
Today, we honor all of the brave men and women who have served & sacrificed. Thank you.#VeteransDay#ThankYou#Honor#Salute

On Saturday, November 2, volunteers gathered in the OSJL Distribution Center to fill Buckets for Vets, which included winter coats, other protective clothing, a hygiene kit, first aid supplies and essentials, that will be distributed Philadelphia, PA, this Saturday, November 15. Volunteers came out from OSJL, the Rhode Island State Police, the RI National Guard, Seabees, VFW, American Legion, Electric Boat Veterans Foundation, LaSalle Academy, Rocky Hill School, Altus Dental, Travelers Insurance, and more. Also in attendance were Governor Dan McKee, Senator Jack Reed, Senator Sheldon Whitehouse, Congressman Gabe Amo, and General of the RI National Guard Christopher Callahan showing their support!

It was a beautiful weekend for a Grand Opening in Pembroke, MA! Our newest store, located at 295 Old Oak Street, marksOcean State Job Lot's 51st store in#Massachusettsand the 153rd store in the chain. This new store location revitalizes the former Christmas Tree Shops and provides our customers with 31,000 square feet of retail shopping space. Congratulations and welcome associates of#pembrokeStore 261!#retailnews#growwithus#grandopening
Today we honor the heroes who risked their lives to save others, those who lost their lives, and all who were affected by this tragedy. ‚ù§Ô∏è#NeverForget

We have three more new stores to announce! üì£Ocean State Job Lotis coming soon to#Avon, MA;#Augusta, ME; and#StAlbans, VT! All three new stores will open this fall, with the Avon and Augusta stores occupying former Christmas Tree Shops locations, and our St. Albans store filling a space formerly occupied by Peebles. We can't wait to bring our amazing deals to these communities!#retailnews#growwithus#comingsoon

Ocean State Job Lothas been named one of America‚Äôs Greatest Workplaces for Parents & Families by Newsweek for 2024! We are the only General Retailer in our competitive set (based on number of associates and company size) to make the list. üèÜ This award is a reflection of OSJL's dedication to fostering a culture of open communication with associates. By actively listening to, acting on, and incorporating associate feedback, OSJL has created a best-in-industry benefits and perks package that puts associates‚Äô health and overall well-being first. One thousand companies were ranked, and OSJL is honored to be one of them! üéâ#retailnews#peoplefirst#growwithus

updates.text:
Today we opened our last Restaurant of the year ‚Äì C962 in Riverside, CA ‚Äì setting our own record of over 100 Restaurants in a single year!¬†
¬†
That‚Äôs 118 total new Restaurants on the year (102 Company/16 Franchise)¬†
¬†
BIG THANK YOU¬†to the whole team, all involved in making this a reality. Enjoy this quick look back at 100+ openings.

It's time to 'Raise a little Cane' this holiday season with our limited-edition Candy Cane Plush Puppy!

Plush puppies are a fan-favorite tradition at Cane‚Äôs that supports a great cause. Net proceeds* for every Candy Cane Plush Puppy sold in our Restaurants and online are donated to local and national 501(c)(3) pet welfare organizations across the country. 

Need a pup for that special Caniac in your life? Stop by your local Raising Cane‚Äôs or our retail website to grab yours today, while supplies last!

Find a Cane's near you:https://lnkd.in/gWbXmH76Purchase online:https://lnkd.in/gMJB4pBM*Net Proceeds (purchase price before tax minus product cost) equals a minimum of $3.00 per Plush Puppy. Ends 1/5/2025 or while supplies last. Purchase is not tax deductible. For more information visitraisingcanes.com. ¬© 2024 Raising Cane‚Äôs USA, LLC

Big thanks to our Crew for making it happen again, and again, and again... we are proud to be recognized as a Top Workplace in DFW for 16 straight years. There's only one business that can claim that honor and we continue to keep that streak alive, thanks to our great Crew, who love what they do. 

Click the story below for more information on this accolade, and if you're interested in starting a rewarding journey with us, please visitwww.WorkAtCanes.com.

When we say you can at Cane‚Äôs, we mean it. Whether you want to pursue a college degree, buy a home, grow your career, find work-life balance or all of the above, our best-in-class benefits give you the support you need to make it happen here.

In the restaurant industry, you often hear about the challenges of pursuing these personal and professional milestones. We reached out to a few of our Crewmembers who recently found what they were looking for through opportunities at Cane‚Äôs.

Visitwww.WorkAtCanes.comto see where your journey at Cane‚Äôs could take you and to learn more about our industry-leading support.#OneLove

To recognize, reward and celebrate our leaders, we hosted more than 3,000 Raising Cane‚Äôs leaders and their significant others at Moon Palace Resort in Cancun from Sunday to Wednesday in an industry-defining conference that was centered around relaxing and having a good time. Set to operate more than 875 Restaurants and eclipse nearly $5B in sales by the end of the year, we owe it all to our leaders who are driving the business forward each and every day. Attendees for the all-expenses-paid trip included all Restaurant Leaders, Business Unit and Restaurant Support Crew along with their spouses or significant others.

To kick things off, leaders and their guests arrived on Sunday to a fully Cane‚Äôs branded five-star resort in Canc√∫n where they received Canec√∫n-branded swag bags and started the trip with a welcome reception filled with drinks, music and good times. Monday was filled with leisure and an array of optional activities including beach volleyball and yoga and optional sessions for financial wellbeing; ‚ÄúMaking Millionaires,‚Äù which detailed all elements of the Raising Cane‚Äôs Restaurant Partner Program including the long-term incentive program that allows the Restaurant Partners to become millionaires within seven to 10 years; maximizing benefits; optimizing mental energy; Spanish lessons and more. 

Later in the day, attendees gathered to hear from Owner and Founder Todd Graves about the history of Cane‚Äôs and co-CEO and COO AJ Kumaran. Kumaran talked about the industry leading programs Cane‚Äôs has in place as well as upcoming programs to help Raising Cane‚Äôs scale to become a top 10 US Restaurant Brand in sales.

Later in the evening, Graves‚Äô good friend and Emmy-award winning rapper and producer Snoop Dogg joined him on stage for a fireside chat about entrepreneurism, work ethic, leadership, family and success. While on stage, Graves presented Snoop, who is a huge Bruce Lee fan,¬†with Bruce Lee‚Äôs famous nunchucks from Enter the Dragon as a gift of appreciation for coming to Cancun to both inspire and entertain Cane‚Äôs leaders. 
¬†
Directly following, attendees went outside for a drone and firework show and concert from Snoop Dogg where he sang and DJ‚Äôd.
¬†
On Tuesday morning, nine-time Olympic gold medalist spoke to leaders about inspiration, motivation, and chasing a dream. Following Ledecky‚Äôs keynote, she was joined by Graves and Kumaran on stage for a Q&A session where they asked about how Katie stays motivated and what it means to be a leader.

To round out Canec√∫n, leaders were encouraged to take the rest of Tuesday to rest and relax before departing on Wednesday.¬†

Thanks to everyone who had a hand in making Canecun a reality. Here's to more big things in the future.
After years of planning, we were able to finally execute our celebration of our leaders in Cancun. Thanks for sharing your perspective!

Our Co-CEO & COO, AJ Kumaran, recently sat down with The Exchange on CNBC to speak to our history, our passion, our Golden Birthday and our unique opening in Boston. In addition, AJ talked about several key business points including price, profits, labor and our positive same restaurant sales for the last 15 years in a row.
¬†¬†
2024 has been another one for the books and we‚Äôre excited to see how the year closes out given our year-to-date and aggressive plans ahead ‚Äì always supporting our Crew, Customers and Communities.#OneLove#Growth

28 years of golden Chicken Fingers calls for a celebration! A golden birthday is a momentous occasion when someone's date of birth aligns with the age they're turning ‚Äì an occurrence so rare that instead of celebrating the day, we're celebrating all year. 
 
Yesterday, August 28, we began to celebrate our 28th¬†birthday with the opening of our 828th¬†restaurant in¬†Boston¬†to kick off a year of golden moments beginning with a pledge to¬†give back¬†$28M¬†to local communities¬†throughout the coming year. 
 
To help celebrate in¬†Boston, "Big Papi," Jrue Holiday, and JVKE ‚Äì all of whom have "gold" in common between MLB Championship trophies, NBA Championship trophies, Olympic medals, and a hit single called "golden hour" ‚Äì helped us open the milestone Restaurant in golden style. 
 
A big 'thank you' to all involved in making this opening a special one and here's to a year-long celebration! 
 
Cane's has grown to more than 800 Restaurants across more than 40 states and continues opening 100 Restaurants each year. With sights set on becoming a top 10 US Restaurant brand by 2030, we're looking to grow to more than¬†150K¬†Crewmembers across 1,600 Restaurants and¬†$10B¬†in sales.

We recently recognized several Raising Cane‚Äôs Restaurant Leaders who received the call they‚Äôve been dreaming of, welcoming them to our industry-leading Restaurant Partner Program.

What‚Äôs a Restaurant Partner at Cane‚Äôs? They are the best of the best, our top Operators, who go above and beyond to serve our Customers, Crew and Communities every day. Through their hard work and dedication, they embody the values Raising Cane‚Äôs in their Communities and prove that you can at Cane‚Äôs!

Our Restaurant Partners receive best-in-class, ongoing development training and education to further their skills and overall impact as leaders, as well as incredible financial incentives and industry-leading compensation. In fact, our Restaurant Partners are on their way to building a net worth of $1 million in net assets while maintaining their current lifestyle.

Congratulations to our new Restaurant Partners and Restaurant Partner Candidates. The program now consists of more than 160 Restaurant Partners across the system and over 100 Restaurant Partner Candidates currently in the process to achieve their goals of earning their way into the program.

Start your adventure with us today atwww.WorkAtCanes.com.

Forbes recently announced their America‚Äôs Best Employers for Women report for 2024 and we are again on the list! Forbes partnered with market research firm Statista to survey more than 150,000 women working at companies with at least 1,000 employees in the United States. 

Survey respondents were asked how likely they were to recommend their current‚Äîand previous‚Äîemployers, and if they‚Äôd recommend any employers they knew through their industry or through family and friends who work there. Participants were also asked to rate their current employers in such areas as working environment, pay equity, parental leave, and the company‚Äôs handling of incidents related to sexual misconduct and discrimination. Responses from the last three years were considered. 

Click in to learn more about where we landed on the list and if you'd like to learn more about the current opportunities at Cane's, please visithttp://WorkAtCanes.com/#RaisingCanes#OneLove#YouCanAtCanes

name: Tulane Center for Public Service
about:
The Center for Public Service at Tulane University was established in 2006 as part of the university‚Äôs Renewal Plan, instituted after Hurricane Katrina. CPS supports a university curriculum and research agenda by uniting academics and action and encouraging students, faculty, and community partners to dedicate themselves to the transformation of civic life.

At CPS, we provide a central location for community organizations and university members to connect, learn, and accomplish shared goals for public good and personal development. We offer opportunities for our partners to learn about potential university resources, working with students and faculty, leveraging existing assets to serve community needs, and developing the professional skills of their staff members. Our community partners are welcomed and encouraged to engage with Tulane through the Center for Public Service as we aspire to collaboratively develop relationships that benefit everyone.

In line with the University‚Äôs Core Values, we uphold the following as the foundation and guiding principles for community-engagement at Tulane. 
‚Ä¢	Diversity: Treating others with dignity and respect, encouraging expression, and developing understanding of and appreciation for differences and commonalities
‚Ä¢	Openness: Exchanging ideas and information openly and candidly to improve relationships and achieve mutual goals
‚Ä¢	Integrity: Acting ethically, responsibly and courageously to hold ourselves accountable to commitments and to doing what is right
‚Ä¢	Excellence: Performing at our very best and engaging issues as opportunities to learn, grow, and succeed
‚Ä¢	Community: Developing authentic, trusting relationships and participating in civic life
locations: 6823 St. Charles Ave., 70118 New Orleans, Louisiana, US

updates.text:
Tulane‚Äôs Center for Public Service is¬†hiring¬†for a Service Learning Coordinator.¬†This role works with a small team of staff and an amazing cohort of student leaders to support faculty, community partners, and Tulane students in carrying out a wide range of service learning projects as part of Tulane‚Äôs undergraduate public service requirement. This work is very relationship-based, fast-paced, and multi-faceted, and we aim to approach the work with curiosity, compassion and a critical lens.¬† 

Apply herehttps://lnkd.in/g44gRq-YContact Bridget Smith with any questions:bridget1@tulane.edu

Since February 2023, I‚Äôve proudly served as Project Manager ofTulane Trash to Treasure(T2T), a student-led waste reduction and community service initiative. We collect donated dorm items during move-out and resell them at huge discounts during the following year‚Äôs move-in week, with all profits going to local charities.

First, I have to shout out our incredible student executive board (Laine Benard,Eleanor Bruner,Diya Karthic,William M.,Ella Moses, Daniel Ralph, Shruti Srinivasan,Yang Tao, &Maya Wilson-Ehrenthal), Office of Sustainability Director Jordan Stewart,Tulane Center for Public Service(CPS) Associate DirectorMaurice S., and CPS Program LeaderRiley Garrett.

In October,Keep Louisiana Beautifulhonored T2T with the Collegiate Environmental Steward Award, recognizing ten years of service and leadership. To build on this success, we prioritized fostering new collaborations and scaling up operations to better serve the growing on-campus population.

The 2024 Move-Out Collection was our biggest ever, expanding from four to seven donation drop-off stations and diverting over 370,000 pounds of reusable items from landfills! Our friends at Tulane CPS sorted and transferred more than 15 tons of items to local organizations. Partnerships withGoodwill Industries of Southeastern Louisianaand Tulane Shuttles & Transportation provided vehicles and drivers to expand our reach. Joint marketing efforts withGlass Half FullandStudents Against Food Insecurity (SAFI)encouraged glass recycling and food donations during our collection.

Additionally, we joined Tulane's CACTUS network to strengthen ties with other service orgs and secure university funding for the first time. We also co-hosted fun events withLouisiana SPCAto bring adoptable dogs to campus and with First-Year Experience to give out free snoballs during finals!

I look forward to staying involved next year after passing the torch to the dedicated and experiencedElla Moses. T2T is in good hands!

Thank you all for helping make our campus more sustainable, and as always ‚Äì stay trashy! üóëÔ∏èüíé
